marklogic.body:
Â I've struggled with self harm for years.Â I'm on a clean streak at the moment I'm trying not to break.Â My Dad never believed in mental illness until my Mom had a nervous breakdown that nearly killed her and still had a hard time while I was in high school cutting 3+ times a day, happy one moment, depressed the next.Â My Mom, who knew all about depression and stuff, was convinced it was hormones.Â She's now convinced it's depression.Â I've been diagnosed several times as bipolar with an Anxiety problem.
I've been trying forever to find a good combination of therapy and meds to help me.Â Having a supportive partner has Always helped me more than anything else.
Hopefully my story will go like yours soon and I'll find a good therapist and good plan of action and start doing a whole hell of a lot better.Â Thanks for giving me hope <3
